A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In my opinion it was the worst star wars movie I have seen so far. \nIt begins as a bad copie of Space balls\, the force itself just becomes something mundane and overused thing instead of a mystical power wich it is supposed to be and the entire concept of the story is not fitting to the star wars franchise.\nAt best this is a mediocre stand alone film compared to todays films and franchises.
